name: A Hole In The Dark
description:
WARNING: It is highly recommended to play this game in fullscreen!

Holly is trapped in a dark dungeon, unable to find a way out. Her vision is obscured, but there are some holes in the darkness... maybe she can use them to find a way out. Her mission is to recover the 15 golden monoliths, and get out of this terrifying place!

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Spacebar - Jump

R - Reload level
